Detailed Description

File plugin module Module that handles file access

Define Documentation

#define orxFILE_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_APPEND   0x00000004

descriptor positioned at the end of file

#define orxFILE_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_READ   0x00000001

opened for read

#define orxFILE_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_WRITE   0x00000002

opened for write

Closes an oppened file

Parameters:
_pstFile (IN) File's pointer to close
Returns:
Returns the status of the operation

orxDLLAPI orxFILE* orxFile_Open ( const orxSTRING  _zPath,
orxU32  _u32OpenFlags 
)

Opens a file for later read or write operation

Parameters:
_zPath (IN) Full file's path to open
_u32OpenFlags (IN) List of used flags when opened
Returns:
a File pointer (or orxNULL if an error has occured)

orxDLLAPI orxU32 orxFile_Read ( void *  _pReadData,
orxU32  _u32ElemSize,
orxU32  _u32NbElem,
orxFILE *  _pstFile 
)

Reads data from a file

Parameters:
_pReadData (OUT) Pointer where will be stored datas
_u32ElemSize (IN) Size of 1 element
_u32NbElem (IN) Number of elements
_pstFile (IN) Pointer on the file descriptor
Returns:
Returns the number of read elements (not bytes)

orxDLLAPI orxBOOL orxFile_ReadLine ( orxSTRING  _zBuffer,
orxU32  _u32Size,
orxFILE *  _pstFile 
)

Gets text line from a file

Parameters:
_zBuffer (OUT) Pointer where will be stored datas
_u32Size (IN) Size of buffer
_pstFile (IN) Pointer on the file descriptor
Returns:
Returns orxTRUE if a line has been read, else returns orxFALSE.

orxU32  _u32ElemSize,
orxU32  _u32NbElem,
orxFILE *  _pstFile 
)

writes data to a file

Parameters:
_pDataToWrite (IN) Pointer where will be stored datas
_u32ElemSize (IN) Size of 1 element
_u32NbElem (IN) Number of elements
_pstFile (IN) Pointer on the file descriptor
Returns:
Returns the number of written elements (not bytes)
